vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐνεῖδον,
aorist 2 with no present in use, ἐνοράω being used instead, see or observe in, τι ἔν τινι [Refs 5th c.BC+]: with accusative, observe, remark, [Refs 5th c.BC+]: with participle, πλέον ἐνεῖδον σχήσοντες [Refs 5th c.BC+]infinitive, ἃ ἀρωγὰ ἐνείδομεν.. ἔσεσθαι[Refs]: with dative, gaze at, ἀτενὲς ἐ. αὐγῇ [Refs 4th c.AD+]
